category: Regulations for overseas Korean sports organizations/Article 7 (Rights and obligations of overseas Korean sports organizations)
contents: Article 7 (Rights and obligations of overseas Korean sports organizations) ① Overseas Korean sports organizations have the following rights with respect to the sports association. 1. The right to participate in sports association projects promoted within the Republic of Korea. 2. The right to dispatch athletes to national sports competitions hosted by the Korea Sports Association. ② Overseas Korean sports organizations have the following obligations to the sports association. 1. Obligation to comply with the Articles of Association of the Sports Council and these regulations 2. Obligation to use and settle financial support from the Sports Council in accordance with the relevant regulations, guidelines and support purposes 3. Representatives to maintain and prove the representativeness and continuity of the organization In case of changes, there is an obligation to submit the changes to the Sports Council after receiving a recommendation letter from the Korean Embassy abroad.
